metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:fileauditedpermissions53_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:fileauditedpermissions53_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path, filename, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path, filename, and trustee_sid pattern match is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path pattern match, filename, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path, filename pattern match, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse_direction behavior is supported in the 'up' direction.
Test that the include_group behavior is supported.
Test that the resolve_group behavior is supported.

fileauditedpermissions53_test.comment: Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path, filename, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path, filename, and trustee_sid pattern match is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path pattern match, filename, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a fileauditedpermissions53_object with a path, filename pattern match, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse_direction behavior is supported in the 'up' direction.
Test that the include_group behavior is supported.
Test that the resolve_group behavior is supported.

fileauditedpermissions53_object.comment: File object with path equals 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
File object with path equals 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
File object with path equals 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid matching '^S-1-5-32-[0-9-]+'.
File object with path matching '^C:\\Program Files\\Internet.*' filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
File object with path equals 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' filename matching '^i.*' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
File object with path starting at 'C:\Program Files', recursing down 1 level, and filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
File object with path starting at 'C:\Program Files', recursing down 1 infinitely, and filename equals 'install.ins' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'
File object with path starting at 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\SIGNUP', recursing up 1 level, and filename equals 'iexplore.exe', and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

File object with path equals 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer', filename equals 'iexplore.exe'. and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544' with resolve_group behavior set to true and the include_group behavior set to true.

File object with path equals 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer', a filename equal to 'iexplore.exe', and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544' with resolve_group behavior set to true and the include_group behavior set to false.

fileauditedpermissions53_state.comment: This state represents a file which has a path equals 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a file which has a path of 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a file which has a path of 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid matching '^S-1-5-32-[0-9-]+'.
This state represents a file which has a path matching '^C:\\Program Files\\Internet.*' and filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a file which has a path of 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and filename matching '^i.*' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a file which has a path of 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and filename equals 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a file which has a path that matches '^C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer.*' filename equals 'install.ins' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a file which has a path that matches 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and filename of 'iexplore.exe'.
This state represents a file which has a path that matches 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer' and filename of 'iexplore.exe' and trustee_sid not equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
